acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle POJOs with private constructors only
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithPrivateOnlyConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm33.PrivateOnlyConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the String field 0Mi46qI0ok cannot be null or empty
Then the int field should not be zero
